title: Read monetary return an irrigation from graph

content.question: Which of the following statements best explains the graphs above?

choices.label: The price of cotton is high because cotton growing uses a lot of water.
Fruits and vegetables give the greatest monetary return per water usage.
Raising cattle for consumption uses few resources.
The amount of livestock exceeds the amount of fruits and vegetables grown.
People consume more vegetables than they do rice.

content.answer: Fruits and vegetables give the greatest monetary return per water usage.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
